definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: Stop and visit the medieval castle.
sentences.chinese: 停下来游览这个中世纪的古堡。

sentences.english: Hundred Years' Translation Movement began to arise in Abbasid Dynasty of Arab in the Middle Ages.
sentences.chinese: 百年翻译运动兴起于中世纪阿拉伯的阿拔斯王朝。

sentences.english: Aemma and Omsg have camping weekend in Qubec every year.
sentences.chinese: 渥太华中世纪剑会每年都举行露营周末。

sentences.english: One is reminded of the idealized image of feudal Europe presented by latter-day conservative Catholics such as G.
sentences.chinese: 这唤起了我们对中世纪欧洲的理想化印象，它在G。

sentences.english: So let me roll the clock back to medieval England.
sentences.chinese: 所以，让我回溯到中世纪的英国。

sentences.english: From the Middle Ages to the 18th century, trade in beads was enormous.
sentences.chinese: 中世纪到18世纪珠饰贸易的规模很大。

sentences.english: are typical of medieval Islamic glassware.
sentences.chinese: 都是中世纪伊斯兰的玻璃制品所特有的。

sentences.english: The major medieval and modern view on the problem of universals other than nominalism.
sentences.chinese: 主要中世纪和现代观点对问题的共性以外唯名。

sentences.english: My favorite piece of furniture in the whole house is the mid-century Scandinavian sideboard.
sentences.chinese: 整座屋子里我最喜欢的家具就是这个中世纪北欧边桌。

sentences.english: Knight system is rooted in the superstratum society of mid-century Europe.
sentences.chinese: 骑士制度产生于中世纪欧洲的上层社会。

sentences.english: It's really a remarkable thing that happens in the mid-century.
sentences.chinese: 这确实是发生在中世纪不同寻常的事情。

sentences.english: Use multiple medieval weapons for close combat & long-range attacks or to trigger activations.
sentences.chinese: 使用多个中世纪武器的近战和远程攻击，或触发激活。

sentences.english: Almost every way of life in the medieval period was washed away by the tide of change.
sentences.chinese: 改革浪潮荡涤了中世纪生活的几乎每个方面。

sentences.english: Then the rediscovery of Western culture in Europe in the Late Middle Ages prompted the Renaissance.
sentences.chinese: 西方文化复兴于文艺复兴繁荣的中世纪晚期。

sentences.english: These exhibits includes some fine examples of medieval pottery.
sentences.chinese: 这些展览品中包括一些中世纪陶器精品。

sentences.english: The poets and "saints" of medieval bhakti appeared throughout India.
sentences.chinese: 中世纪的巴克提诗人和“圣人”遍布了印度。

definition: Bohemia, historical country of central Europe

pinyin: Shen2 sheng4 Luo2 ma3 Di4 guo2
